mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `experiment_test` ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL, pid INTEGER default 0, java_pid INTEGER default 0, state INTEGER DEFAULT 0, create_time TEXT DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_time TEXT DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, is_deleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0 CHECK (is_deleted IN (0, 1)) )
-- 创建更新时间触发器 CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS 'update_experiment_time' AFTER UPDATE ON experiment_test BEGIN UPDATE experiment_test SET update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = OLD.id; END;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM experiment_test WHERE id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0;
